attributes.action: Disclose under freedom of information, in the public best interest all cases of child abuse which has occured in social care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Statistically it is a well known fact that more children are abused in social care, than in their own homes, however inadequate the authorities believe the natural families are?? Most of the cases of children abused in care are suppressed and kept out of the public domain. In light of the recent exposure of malpractice in failing CAFCASS and most associated departments and the secrecy of family courts. I believe we, the public have right to know the truth, about what really happens in social care, and the deliberate social engineering taking place, to destroy healthy families. A Fabian led social engineering policy since at least 1700.

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions, we will not accept Freedom of Information requests made via e-petition.  If you wish to make a Freedom of Information request of 10 Downing Street, please see http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/freedom-of-information.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
